column1: # THIS FILE WAS CREATED FOR TESTING PURPOSES. The biomes in the "30biomes" mod do not cover all
#       heights, heats and humidities, so they are not suitable for use in a real game (unless
#       combined with other mods and/or packages that provide additional biomes)
